title: US Open 2025 mixed doubles: How event featuring Carlos Alcaraz and Emma Raducanu is dividing opinion
description: With the revamped US Open mixed doubles starting on Tuesday, BBC Sport looks at the positives and negatives of the controversial change.
content:
Whether you love it or loathe it, the revamped US Open mixed doubles cannot be ignored.
Transforming the event by enticing the superstars to play with huge cash prizes, a shorter format and new slot before the singles start is a bold move by the Unit... [656 chars]

title: Four key takeaways from Trump’s White House summit on Ukraine
description: The US president has hosted European leaders at short notice amid intense political efforts to end the war in Ukraine. Here are four key points to what was achieved
content: 1. A meeting between Zelenskyy and Putin ... could it finally happen? A bilateral meeting between Volodymyr Zelenskyy and Vladimir Putin is something the Russian president has always resisted, urging for a list of preconditions to be met first, but t... [2611 chars]

title: 'Eating disorder misdiagnosis left me with PTSD'
description: Charlotte Chapman-Hart tells of her experience of a lack of uncoordinated and informed care.
content:
Weighing six stone and on the brink of organ failure, Charlotte Chapman-Hart is admitted to hospital in excruciating pain.
It's assumed the former model and dancer has an eating disorder.

title: Most of Windermere polluted with sewage bacteria, finds biggest survey of its kind
description: Exclusive: Concentrations of faecal bacteria in the lake were found to peak in summer but there were high levels throughout year
content:
Bathing water quality across most of Windermere is poor throughout the summer, indicating high levels of sewage pollution, according to a comprehensive analysis of water quality in England’s largest lake.
